DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim observational study evaluate blood glucose control use NovoMix® 50 12 month initiation subject type 2 diabetes currently therapy human biphasic insulin . An additional objective also observe different regime start maintain treatment NovoMix® 50 one year .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study NovoMix® 50 Treatment Type 2 Diabetics 12 Months
